General.Name: Foodlink A.E
General.Description: Foodlink A.E. primarily provides integrated logistics services. It offers contract logistics including cross-docking, reverse logistics, and co-packing/repackaging; international transportation services, such as road transport, air transport, shipping, and cross docking; sales logistics; e-shop logistics comprising secretarial support & goods management, file management, financial management, courier services, and computerization services; specialized courier services; and logistics intelligence services. Foodlink A.E. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Aspropyrgos, Greece.
